CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, July 16, 1960, pg. 22, reads: "Constable at Bat - Constable Tommy Smith strikes a pose with the bat, while some of the stars of his crack Tommy Smith All-Stars softball team look on with smiles of 'approval.' Left to right, rear: Tom Watkins and William Hall watch the 'boss.' The batboy is Wesley Connors, a Little League star last year, who is following his favorites around the circuit this year.  The Smith aggregation is on the victory march once more, after suffering several losses. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Members of Tommy Smith All-Stars softball team, batboy Wesley Connors, Tom Watkins, William Hall, and Thomas J. "Tommy" Smith holding baseball  bat, posed in front low bleachers and chain link fence
